requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3632QM Processor
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is possible to play even with a laptop without graphic board
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5200U Processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® RTX 2060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can feel more realistic by using earphones/headphones
